pages.title: Gravion Disk
pages.text: A raw $(item)Graviton$() is dangerous. It warps the space around it, pulls things toward it, makes you feel heavier just standing nearby. So the Architects surrounded it with $(item)Neutrion Ingots$() in a disk shape.$(br2)The disk stabilizes the gravitational field enough to make it safe to handle. Mostly safe, anyway. Don't drop it.
